sentences.en: A great uniformity of work prevails over the wide expanse.
sentences.cn: 在这片广大土地上的工作是一种统一的伟大工作.

sentences.en: A soil having a uniformity coefficient smaller than 2 is considered uniform.
sentences.cn: 均匀系数小于2的土壤可视为均质土.

sentences.en: Coating deposition is controlled by computer to ensure uniformity.
sentences.cn: 计算机全自动控制,工艺稳定,重复性好.

sentences.en: Excessive uniformity may prevent further progress after a few generations.
sentences.cn: 过分的单一化,有可能阻止几代后的进一步发展.

sentences.en: It is not out of a dead uniformity that they can be expected to raise.
sentences.cn: 人们不可能期待它们从死气沉沉的单调中诞生出来.

sentences.en: Spanish liberals sought to create linguistic as well as administrative uniformity.
sentences.cn: 西班牙自由主义者寻求语言及行政上的统一。

sentences.en: The pressure towards uniformity constantly threatens to erode local traditions.
sentences.cn: 一体化的压力一直威胁着地方传统.

sentences.en: There is lack of uniformity in the annual reports.
sentences.cn: 这几份年度报告缺乏一致性.

sentences.en: There seems to be no uniformity among the various systems.
sentences.cn: 各系统之间似乎没有统一性。

sentences.en: These are modern materials having greater uniformity and higher optical sensitivity.
sentences.cn: 这些是均质性更好、光学灵敏度更高的现代材料.

sentences.en: They prospered in their diversity more than in uniformity.
sentences.cn: 他们的兴旺,与其说是得力于整齐划一,不如说是得力于参差错落.

sentences.en: This knowledge of connections has a universal validity because of the uniformity of nature.
sentences.cn: 这种关于联系的认识是放之四海而皆准的,因为自然界是统一的.

sentences.en: This uniformity of material and structure is perhaps the most striking discovery of stellar astronomy.
sentences.cn: 物质及其结构的这种一致性,也许是恒星天文学上的最惊人的发现.

sentences.en: This universal uniformity contributed to his malaise.
sentences.cn: 这种千篇一律的格式,使他感到很不舒服.

sentences.en: Uniformity and predictability are also important in many areas of economic regulation.
sentences.cn: 在许多经济调控领域,一致性和预见性也是非常重要的.

sentences.en: We're all getting - lashed to the great wheel of uniformity.
sentences.cn: 我们都被鞭子赶着进入那个千篇一律的大论了.

words.tran_cn: 统一的；一致的；相同的；均衡的；始终如一的
使穿制服（或军服）；使成一样（uniform的过去式）
使一律；使均匀；使始终如一

trans.tran_cn: 均匀性，单调，无变化，同样，一样
trans.tran_en: the quality of being or looking the same as all other members of a group
